name: Andrew Shearer
body:
### Andrew Shearer
I'm a software engineer who works primarily with C++ and PHP.  I'm also a big fan of Vim.  Checkout out my [.vimrc](https://github.com/aishear/dotfiles/blob/master/.vimrc)

### Projects
See my [Bitbucket account](bitbucket.aisherer.com) for all of my public projects.

### Contact
Email me by sending an message to any word at aishearer.com.
I have my mail service set-up to redirect any mail sent to my domain to my main account.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
